summary: Add new Follower Liliana. She is Healer and Necromancer. ! This MOD is WIP !
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/7/1/716b14de.png[/img][/center]

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・
[size=3]MTG's Liliana Vess based follower.
It's only "based" on Liliana, so there may be some differences with the real Liliana.[/size]
[size=3]You can find Liliana at the "Temple of the Divines" in Solitude.[/size]
[size=3]She is essential and can not be married. Body is UNPB.
She is Healer, Necromancer and Conjurer.[/size]


[color=#9900ff][size=4]Special Abilities_______________[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]Call Servant[/size][/color]
[size=3]Summons a Draugr
[center][img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/d/4/d454e35d.png[/img][/center][/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]Healing[/size][/color]
[size=3]Heals player and other followers.
(Thanks a lot [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57162/]okame28[/url]!)[/size]
[center][img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/c/7/c7d0a8cf.png[/img][/center]

[color=#9900ff][size=4]To do next_____________[/size][/color]

[size=3]・Add "demonic Contract"(tatoo) to her skin[/size]
[size=3]・Edit Liliana's magic to make it unique[/size]
[size=3]・Add more MTG Planeswalker characters[/size]

・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・

[color=#9900ff][size=4]Credit_____________

[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]*Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]

[/url][color=#9900ff][size=4]Uned MOD in ScreenShot_____________[/size][/color]
